Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Nimman Mai Design Hotel in Chiang Mai (Nimman), you'll be minutes from Museum of World Insects and Natural Wonders and close to Chiang Mai National Museum. This hotel is close to Chiang Mai City Arts & Cultural Center and Wat Phrathat Doi Suthep.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 56 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. 37-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bathrobes. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Nimman Mai Design Hotel.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Nimman Mai Design Hotel.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bathrobes. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Nimman Mai Design Hotel in Chiang Mai (Nimman), you'll be minutes from Museum of World Insects and Natural Wonders and close to Chiang Mai National Museum. This hotel is close to Chiang Mai City Arts & Cultural Center and Wat Phrathat Doi Suthep.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Museum of World Insects and Natural Wonders - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Kad Suan Kaew Shopping Centre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Ton Payom Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Wat Jed Yot - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Wat Suan Dok - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Chiang Mai University - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Wat Lok Moli - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Chiang Mai National Museum - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Wat Phra Singh - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Chang Puak Market - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Chiang Mai Rajabhat University - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Buak Haad Park - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Chiang Mai City Arts & Cultural Center - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Wat Umong - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Three Kings Monument - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi

The preferred airport for Nimman Mai Design Hotel is Chiang Mai (CNX-Chiang Mai Intl.) - 3.3 km / 2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
